titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Phospholan.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10582-10583)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on 2-methyl 2.5 dioxo 1.2 oxaphospholan (phospholan).
